name: JPSVolumeButtonHandler
summary: JPSVolumeButtonHandler provides an easy block interface to hardware volume buttons on iOS devices. Perfect for camera apps!
description:
JPSVolumeButtonHandler provides an easy block interface to hardware volume buttons on iOS devices. Perfect for camera apps! Features:
* Run blocks whenever a hardware volume button is pressed
* Volume button presses don't affect system audio
* Hide the HUD typically displayed on volume button presses
* Works even when the system audio level is at its maximum or minimum, even when muted
